bvngeeaddons.config.creativeInteractCaul:
Stops extra bottles or buckets being added to
your inventory when interacting with cauldron in
creative! ยง6NOTE: This feature works only in singleplayer!
Idea: schmoe_mc

When on servers, creativeInteractCauldronFix uses
a hacky version that works by manually editing
the inventory after interacting with cauldrons.
bvngeeaddons.config.removeAutoJumpButton:
Removes the Auto Jump button and disables Auto Jump.
Cuz why the fuck not?
bvngeeaddons.config.bossBarRenderMode.co:
Compact mode renders only 1 boss bar for each type
 + the total boss count; None disables boss bars entirely
bvngeeaddons.config.shownBossBarType.com:
Dictates whether to show the boss bars of only withers,
only dragons, or both
bvngeeaddons.config.separateBossesWithNa:
Separates all name tagged bosses when using the
Compact or None bossBarRenderMode
bvngeeaddons.config.bossBarScale.comment: The scale from 0 to 1 at which to render all boss bars
bvngeeaddons.config.screenshotUtils.comm:
Adds UNDO and RENAME buttons next to the
screenshot log message in chat
The hotkey used to open this gui
